name: Warehouse
overview: Warehouse is a video game written by Ian Bateman and Philip Watts. It was developed by Pillar Graphics in 1987 and released for the BBC Microcomputer in 1988 by Top Ten Software. Game description: Warehouse is an action adventure set in a space warehouse. You have to find specific items and send them to certain customers. The warehouse is filled with monsters and portals that spawn them. To stop the portals from spawning them you have to shoot them.
